title: Main Page
data:
**[NetHackWiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki "NetHackWiki") is a [free](/wiki/Free "Free") community web site for the game *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")* that anyone can edit. This wiki is one big spoiler, so turn back now if you want to figure things out for yourself. Otherwise, consider taking a look at the basic [strategy](/wiki/Standard_strategy "Standard strategy") page.**

[edit](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Template:News\&action=edit)

### News

- **1st June 2024** - [Junethack](/wiki/Junethack "Junethack") 2024 has begun!
- **24th May 2024** - [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") version 0.8.4 has been released. See [this reddit post](https://redd.it/1d00gi8) for more information.
- **25th November 2023** - Wiki has moved to new host in a new containerized environment.
- ***[Older news...](/wiki/Template:News "Template:News")***

[start new topic](https://nethackwiki.com/wiki/Forum:Watercooler)

### [Active discussions](/wiki/Forum:Watercooler "Forum:Watercooler")

- [Poll: did you click all links on this wiki?](/index.php?title=Forum:Poll:_did_you_click_all_links_on_this_wiki%3F\&t=20240628095107 "Forum:Poll: did you click all links on this wiki?")

This [wiki](/wiki/Wiki "Wiki") was founded on 11 October 2005. We have **[4,387](/wiki/Special:Statistics "Special:Statistics")** articles.

**Hello, welcome to NetHackWiki!**

*"Acid blobs should be attacked bare-handed."*

[edit](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Template:Featured_articles/09\&action=edit)

### Featured article

**Demogorgon** is the most difficult of the [demon princes](/wiki/Demon_prince "Demon prince") and, indeed, the most difficult [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") of any sort to appear in [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack"). Fortunately, his appearance is not guaranteed and usually only occurs through [demon summoning](/wiki/Demon_summoning "Demon summoning"). He can be summoned directly by [Orcus](/wiki/Orcus "Orcus"), [Juiblex](/wiki/Juiblex "Juiblex"), or [Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu"), and hence indirectly by any demon that can summon one of these demon lords, or, rarely, by any spellcasting monster that casts "summon nasties" in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"), which includes the [Wizard of Yendor](/wiki/Wizard_of_Yendor "Wizard of Yendor").

***[Read more...](/wiki/Demogorgon "Demogorgon")***

html:
Main Page

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
NetHackWiki is a free community web site for the game NetHack that anyone can edit. This wiki is one big spoiler, so turn back now if you want to figure things out for yourself. Otherwise, consider taking a look at the basic strategy page.
edit

News

  • 1st June 2024 - Junethack 2024 has begun!
  • 24th May 2024 - EvilHack version 0.8.4 has been released. See this reddit post for more information.
  • 25th November 2023 - Wiki has moved to new host in a new containerized environment.
  • Older news...
start new topic

Active discussions

  • Download the NetHackWiki
  • Is there a better word for "uncursed"?
  • Status of the saddled Nightmare...tame, fast, carrying you.
  • My calculation about the best weapon to choose
  • Stupid question
  • Uncursed scroll of enchant armor
  • Bones bemusement
  • Yani: More food!
  • Taming a unique creature
  • Poll: did you click all links on this wiki?

This wiki was founded on 11 October 2005. We have 4,387 articles.

Hello, welcome to NetHackWiki!

"Acid blobs should be attacked bare-handed."
edit

Featured article

Demogorgon is the most difficult of the demon princes and, indeed, the most difficult monster of any sort to appear in NetHack. Fortunately, his appearance is not guaranteed and usually only occurs through demon summoning. He can be summoned directly by Orcus, Juiblex, or Yeenoghu, and hence indirectly by any demon that can summon one of these demon lords, or, rarely, by any spellcasting monster that casts "summon nasties" in Gehennom, which includes the Wizard of Yendor.

Read more...
